is a ski resort town on the
. It is known best for hosting the 1960 Winter Olympics.
Squaw Valley is located off California State Route 89, about 12 miles south of
at the intersection of CA-89 and Interstate 80. The closest city with a major airport is
, about 32 miles east of Truckee on I-80.
Squaw Valley Road is the main arterial. It runs roughly east-west and feeds into California State Route 89 at its eastern end.

value: content=On highway 89 between Tahoe City and interstate 80; Squaw is possibly the most well known resort in all of California, and the setting for the recent book Squallywood. A complete skier's paradise- magazine favorite for its varied terrain, huge size and massive high speed lift system; and a former Olympic village. Its over sized reputation also presents a downside: crowds that even a on mountain the size of Squaw can swamp the intermediate lifts and result in lines.

A way of life for many of the skiiers at Squaw, G.N.A.R. is a points based game whereby each skiier in the game gains points by skiing particular lines in the famous Squaw terrain, with many interesting bonus points available. Grab a copy of

if you are up to the challenge of some of the best lines Squaw has to offer, and a great game while you're at it. Never forget: You are the best skiier on the mountain, and everyone wants to know that.
located near the mountain parking lot, delicious food, extensive wine list, ambiance is a little more staid, but recommended none-the-less.
One of the oldest and most established restaurants it serves typically Californian food, , Plumpjack has a sister restaurant in San Francisco, as you might expect though it is quite expensive.

content=The place for a perfect pint of Guinness, this real Irish pub was built in Ireland, dismantled, shipped over and reassembled. As one might imagine, it offers a wide selection of whisky and live Celtic music.
address=201 Squaw Peak Rd. P.O. Box 2364, Olympic Valley, CA 96146
content=Squaw Valley Lodge is an all condominium suites  Lake Tahoe, California hotel resort on the slopes of Squaw Valley USA that delivers upscale service and a relaxing vacation experience.
content=Squaw Valley Inn has 58 rooms and suites with amazing views.  Shop at their Fashion Boutique and take their wine seminars.

Squaw Valley Lodge is perfectly located next to the cable car and across from the KT-22 lift.

value: content=Olympic Valley. A premier all season mountain resort in California featuring a luxury spa facility, ski packages, championship golf courses, vacation rentals, and a dedicated chairlift.
